data.description:
Control your Sony Bravia TV from your Pebble Watch!

Newer Sony Bravia TVs require a special authentication for network remotes which I found causes other applications to not work. So I wrote this.

Admittedly, the setup process is quite painful. However, I plan to improve this when I can as to increase the usability and audience for this watch application.

Be sure to check the configuration page before launching the watch app. Also, be sure to check out my blog post: http://www.jacobx1.com/2015/05/16/sony-bravia-remote-for-pebble/

This app is not affiliated with the Sony Corporation - it is designed by an owner and fan of their TVs.
